mapper.select: SELECT r.reward_sharing_id, r.hw_product_id, r.regdate, r.fil_paid_per_tb, r.total_fil, r.status, p.hw_product_name, p.hw_product_status, p.recruitment_start_date, p.service_start_date, p.service_end_date, p.total_budget_fil FROM nanodc.hw_reward_sharing r INNER JOIN nanodc.hw_product p ON r.hw_product_id = p.hw_product_id WHERE r.status = 'active' ORDER BY r.regdate DESC

SELECT d.reward_sharing_detail_id, d.hw_reward_sharing_id, d.user_id, d.reward_fil, u.user_name, u.user_status, u.level, u.user_email, u.phone_number, p.service_end_date, p.total_budget_fil, fil_paid_per_tb, status, p.hw_product_name, p.hw_product_status, p.recruitment_start_date, p.service_start_date, p.service_end_date, p.total_budget_fil, r.regdate FROM hw_reward_sharing_detail d INNER JOIN user_info u ON d.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN hw_reward_sharing r ON r.reward_sharing_id = d.hw_reward_sharing_id INNER JOIN hw_product p ON r.hw_product_id = p.hw_product_id WHERE r.status = 'active' AND d.hw_reward_sharing_id= #{hw_reward_sharing_id} ORDER BY r.regdate DESC

SELECT r.hw_product_id, r.regdate, d.reward_sharing_detail_id, d.hw_reward_sharing_id, d.reward_fil, p.hw_product_name, p.hw_product_status FROM hw_reward_sharing_detail d INNER JOIN hw_reward_sharing r ON d.hw_reward_sharing_id = r.reward_sharing_id INNER JOIN hw_product p ON r.hw_product_id = p.hw_product_id WHERE d.user_id = #{user_id} AND p.hw_product_status = '운영중' ORDER BY r.regdate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO nanodc.hw_reward_sharing (hw_product_id, regdate, status, total_fil) VALUES(#{hw_product_id}, NOW(), #{status}, #{total_fil})
INSERT INTO nanodc.hw_reward_sharing_detail (hw_reward_sharing_id, user_id, reward_fil) VALUES(#{hw_reward_sharing_id}, #{user_id}, #{reward_fil})
mapper.select: SELECT reward_sharing_id FROM hw_reward_sharing ORDER BY reward_sharing_id DESC LIMIT 1
